name: Meal Cooker: Hot Soph and Cold Fab Meal

pages.title: This Meal
pages.text: The Hot Sophie and Cold Fabricio Meal is crafted in a Meal Cooker with a hot Sophie in the mainhand and a cold Fabricio in the offhand. This meal gives you 2 nutrition and 9.5 saturation mod and this meal was supposed to kill you when you eat it.
